org.jsfml.internal

Class NativeRef<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jsfml.internal.NativeRef<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the related Java object, if any.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SFMLInputStream.NativeStreamRef

    public abstract class NativeRef<T>
extends Object
    Helper class for managing Java object references and related native pointers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NativeRef()
      Constructs a native reference.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void finalize() 
      boolean hasNonZeroPointer()
      Tests whether this reference has a non-zero native pointer.
      void initialize(T ref)
      Initializes a native reference with the specified Java object.
      protected abstract long nativeInitialize(T ref)
      Initializes a native pointer related to the specified Java object.
      protected abstract void nativeRelease(T ref, long ptr)
      Releases the Java reference, if any, and the managed native pointer, if any.
      void release()
      Releases the managed Java reference, if any, and frees the managed native pointer, if any, including freeing any natively allocated memory.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • NativeRef

        public NativeRef()
        Constructs a native reference.

    • Method Detail

      • nativeInitialize

        protected abstract long nativeInitialize(T ref)
        Initializes a native pointer related to the specified Java object.
        Parameters:
        ref - the related Java object, or null if there is none.
        Returns:
        a native pointer, or 0 if none was initialized.

      • nativeRelease

        protected abstract void nativeRelease(T ref,
                 long ptr)
        Releases the Java reference, if any, and the managed native pointer, if any.

        This also is responsible for natively allocated memory being freed.

        Parameters:
        ref - the Java object reference, or null if there is none.
        ptr - the native pointer, if any.

      • initialize

        public void initialize(T ref)
        Initializes a native reference with the specified Java object.
        Parameters:
        ref - the Java object, or null if none is required.

      • release

        public void release()
        Releases the managed Java reference, if any, and frees the managed native pointer, if any, including freeing any natively allocated memory.

      • hasNonZeroPointer

        public boolean hasNonZeroPointer()
        Tests whether this reference has a non-zero native pointer.
        Returns:
        true if the pointer is non-zero, false if it is NULL.

      • finalize

        protected void finalize()
                 throws Throwable
        Overrides:
        finalize in class Object
        Throws:
        Throwable
